meanings.sent1: The stank from the garbage can was unbearable.
meanings.sent2: The stank of rotten eggs filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The stank in the bathroom made everyone run out!
meanings.sent4: The stank of failure lingered in the air.
meanings.sent5: The stank of the skunk was so strong, it made my eyes water.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, the fish stank so bad that I had to throw it out.
meanings.sent2: The socks stank after a long day of hiking.
meanings.sent3: His excuses stank worse than the fish.
meanings.sent4: The lies he told stank of deceit.
meanings.sent5: The room stank of smoke after the fire.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a feeling of disgust or disapproval.
meanings.sent1: Her attitude had a real stank to it.
meanings.sent2: He gave me a look of stank when I suggested a different plan.
meanings.sent3: The stank on his face was priceless!
meanings.sent4: The stank in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The stank of disappointment hung heavy in the air.
